mc.name: Akki Coalflinger
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

mc.name: Allosaurus Rider
mc.oracleText:
You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost.
Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.
mc.printedText:
You may remove two green cards in your hand from the game rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost.
Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

mc.name: Ambush Commander
mc.oracleText:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

mc.name: Boggart Shenanigans
mc.oracleText: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from play, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

mc.name: Clickslither
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

mc.name: Elemental
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample

mc.name: Elvish Eulogist
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

mc.name: Elvish Harbinger
mc.oracleText:
When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
When Elvish Harbinger comes into play, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Elvish Promenade
mc.oracleText: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.
mc.printedText: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play for each Elf you control.
mc.flavorText: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

mc.name: Elvish Warrior
mc.flavorText: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

mc.name: Emberwilde Augur
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.flavorText: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

mc.name: Flamewave Invoker
mc.oracleText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things--and far worse.

mc.name: Forest
mc.oracleText: G

mc.name: Forgotten Cave
mc.oracleText:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Forgotten Cave comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mc.name: Gempalm Incinerator
mc.oracleText:
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins in play.

mc.name: Gempalm Strider
mc.oracleText:
Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Strider, all Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Giant Growth
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

mc.name: Goblin Burrows
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Goblin Cohort
mc.oracleText: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
mc.printedText: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've played a creature spell this turn.
mc.flavorText: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

mc.name: Goblin Matron
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Matron comes into play, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: There's always room for one more.

mc.name: Goblin Ringleader
mc.oracleText:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

mc.name: Goblin Sledder
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Let's play 'sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

mc.name: Goblin Warchief
mc.oracleText:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText:
Goblin spells you play cost {1} less to play.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.
mc.flavorText: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

mc.name: Forest
mc.oracleText: G

mc.name: Forest
mc.oracleText: G

mc.name: Forest
mc.oracleText: G

mc.name: Harmonize
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."
--Seton, centaur druid

mc.name: Heedless One
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves in play.
mc.flavorText: "Channel your vitality through me."

mc.name: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician
mc.oracleText:
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.
Sacrifice two Mountains: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.
Sacrifice two Mountains: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: "Everybody but me--CHARGE!"

mc.name: Imperious Perfect
mc.oracleText:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

mc.name: Llanowar Elves
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
--Llanowar penalty for trespassing

mc.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
mc.oracleText: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

mc.name: Mogg Fanatic
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "I got it! I got it! I--"

mc.name: Mogg War Marshal
mc.oracleText:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token into play.

mc.name: Moonglove Extract
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

mc.name: Mountain
mc.oracleText: R

mc.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
mc.oracleText: When Mudbutton Torchrunner is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: When Mudbutton Torchrunner is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

mc.name: Raging Goblin
mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste
mc.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

mc.name: Reckless One
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins in play.
mc.flavorText: "Release chaos with me!"

mc.name: Siege-Gang Commander
mc.oracleText:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
When Siege-Gang Commander comes into play, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
mc.oracleText: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "I order you to volunteer."

mc.name: Skirk Fire Marshal
mc.oracleText:
Protection from red
Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
Protection from red
Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

mc.name: Skirk Prospector
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
--Braids, dementia summoner

mc.name: Skirk Shaman
mc.oracleText: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
mc.printedText: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
mc.flavorText: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

mc.name: Slate of Ancestry
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
mc.flavorText: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

mc.name: Spitting Earth
mc.oracleText: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
mc.printedText: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
--Kumano, to his pupils

mc.name: Stonewood Invoker
mc.oracleText: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

mc.name: Sylvan Messenger
mc.oracleText:
Trample
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText:
Trample
When Sylvan Messenger comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

mc.name: Tar Pitcher
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
--A tale of Auntie Grub

mc.name: Tarfire
mc.oracleText: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
--A tale of Auntie Grub

mc.name: Timberwatch Elf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves in play.
mc.flavorText: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

mc.name: Mountain
mc.oracleText: R

mc.name: Mountain
mc.oracleText: R

mc.name: Mountain
mc.oracleText: R

mc.name: Tranquil Thicket
mc.oracleText:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Tranquil Thicket comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mc.name: Voice of the Woods
mc.oracleText: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample into play.
mc.flavorText: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

mc.name: Wellwisher
mc.oracleText: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
mc.printedText: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf in play.
mc.flavorText: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

mc.name: Wildsize
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Two times the size, four times the smell.

mc.name: Wirewood Herald
mc.oracleText: When Wirewood Herald is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Wirewood Herald is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for an Elf card. If you do, reveal that card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

mc.name: Wirewood Lodge
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

mc.name: Wirewood Symbiote
mc.oracleText: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: It drinks fatigue.

mc.name: Wood Elves
mc.oracleText: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Wood Elves comes into play, search your library for a Forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

mc.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
